entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:21 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 5:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 54 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
